question: The world level weapon production unit "Punj Lyod Defence System" was inaugurated in
explanation: Madhya Pradesh, Chief Minister and Union Rural Development Minister inaugurated the world level weapon production unit "Punj Lyod Defence System" in Malanpur Industrial Area of Bhind district. The plant will manufacture the products like X95 carbine and assault rifle, Galil sniper rifle, Tavor assault rifle and Negev Light Machine Gun (LMG).
